os.fullpath: Operating System :: Modern (Vendor-Supported) Desktop Operating Systems :: Windows 7

name: IBC Audio Playlist Scheduler
short_description:
Playlist Scheduler is a software that redefines the way we organize our playlist. It can change the type of music that is playing depending on your choice and at your given hour, minute and even second in a specific day. The software itself is very comfortable to use, you just need to lay down your customized playlist and just let the software do its job, even the computer process is not focused to it, and also when you minimize it, it will still process your playlist.

Audio playing will be possible through the capability of Playlist Scheduler to call a third party software named “Winamp” that can play playlist file (.m3u, .m3u8).

Playlist scheduler features a simple yet powerful interface; focused on what you just need. Modules are user friendly, easy to use and direct to the point.

The following are the modules of the Playlist Scheduler:
1. Upload/Register Playlist
2. Manage Playlist
3. Copy Playlist
